item.title: About
item.description: Dr. Regina Lazarovich, Ph.D. Licensed Clinical Psychologist in California (PSY…) and New York (020676) I know that entering therapy can feel vulnerable and scary. I founded Compass CBT with the intention of providing a safe and non-judgmental space for the challenging and life-changing work of therapy. I approach each client with warmth, curiosity, and respect. While some people know what they want from therapy, not everyone does, and that’s okay.

item.title: Approach
item.description: Therapy is a very personal process and you are a complex human being, not just a collection of symptoms. In our early sessions I will conduct a thorough assessment in order to understand your social and cultural background, life experiences, circumstances, struggles and concerns. Together, we will set goals guided by your values and priorities, and I will devise a treatment plan to help you reach them. We will discuss the plan in detail; you will always know what we are doing and why.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: I am Dr. Regina Lazarovich, Ph.D., clinical psychologist and founder of Compass CBT. My mission is to help you find the life you want. I provide evidence-based cognitive behavior therapy with a compassionate individually-tailored approach. Together we can identify and change unhelpful patterns of thought and behavior that cloud your path. It is never too late to improve your quality of life and experience profound personal growth.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact Us Stop by for a visit 123 Office Park Road, Scotts Valley, CA hello@compasscbt.com +1 347-735-9740 {{ range .Site.Params.contact.social }} {{ end }} --
